metadata.description: "It matters not how man dies, but how he lives." The team has been shattered and a teenage Renegade lies dead - a victim of the Harbinger Foundation led by omega-powered psionic Toyo Harada. This is the story of what happens next. Out of the ashes of Harbinger #25, find out what happens when the full extent of Harada's secret empire is exposed to the public, and just the how the surviving members of the Renegades recover from a catastrophic loss that has changed their lives... their team... and their destinies forever.
metadata.name: Harbinger: Omegas
